text: The Color of Money is a 1986 American sports drama movie about pool players. It was released in 1986. The movie stars Paul Newman, Tom Cruise, and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio. Martin Scorsese was the director. It is the sequel to The Hustler. Newman won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his performance, his first Oscar win after eight nominations, seven of them for Best Actor. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1986 movies Category:1980s drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Scorsese Category:Sequel movies Category:Sports drama movies
title: The Color of Money (movie)
